mapper.select: SELECT A.CSELTYPECD AS lv1_CD, A.CSELTYPENM AS lv1_NM, A.CSELTYPEDEPTH AS lv1_DEPTH, A.CSELTYPEORD AS lv1_ORD FROM TB_WTM_IS_CLSCODE A WHERE CSELTYPEDEPTH = 1 and USEFG ='Y' ORDER BY lv1_DEPTH

SELECT B.lv1_CD, B.lv1_NM, sum(count) AS SUM_COUNT FROM TB_WTM_STAT_KEYWORD A,( SELECT A.CSELTYPECD AS lv1_CD, A.CSELTYPENM AS lv1_NM, A.CSELTYPEDEPTH AS lv1_DEPTH, A.CSELTYPEORD AS lv1_ORD, B.CSELTYPECD AS lv2_CD, B.CSELTYPENM AS lv2_NM, B.CSELTYPEDEPTH AS lv2_DEPTH, B.CSELTYPEORD AS lv2_ORD, C.CSELTYPECD AS lv3_CD, C.CSELTYPENM AS lv3_NM, C.CSELTYPEDEPTH AS lv3_DEPTH, C.CSELTYPEORD AS lv3_ORD FROM TB_WTM_IS_CLSCODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WTM_IS_CLSCODE B ON A.CSELTYPECD = B.PARCSELTYPECD AND B.USEFG ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WTM_IS_CLSCODE C ON B.CSELTYPECD = C.PARCSELTYPECD AND B.USEFG ='Y' WHERE A.CSELTYPEDEPTH = 1 AND A.USEFG ='Y' ORDER BY lv1_CD, lv2_CD, lv3_CD ) B WHERE A.CLS_LABEL = B.lv3_CD AND A.DIV = 'TS' GROUP BY B.lv1_CD, B.lv1_NM ORDER BY SUM_COUNT DESC
